title: I cant open loot.
body:
I just finished the mission in witch i get a worlds orb, and when i try to open loot my client crashes. I tried it a few times and there has been a bugslat every time. It also happened to some of my friends. Thanks in advance.

EDIT: Its all good now it opened.

replies.body: Sounds like a possible connection issue, but I'm glad to hear all is well now!
I cant open my LOOT tab. Everything else works... Any ideas?
